categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 18

The Official Star Wars Fact File 18 was the eighteenth issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on May 1, 2002. The issue was authored by Darren Allanson, Andrew Darling, Chris Gardner, Iain Lowson and Jim Swallow. It also featured original artwork by Paul Williams.
